preference.name: TC_fts_file_size_limit_per_batch
preference.preference_description: Specifies the total file size limit (in MB) for each index batch. In some cases, most of the files contains little text and the user can therefore enlarge this value to index more files in one index batch. Valid value is between 10 and 1000.
